channel.title: cluster on emacsist
channel.description: Recent content in cluster on emacsist

item.title: Redis集群之twemproxy
item.description: 安装 git clone https://github.com/twitter/twemproxy.git cd twemproxy autoreconf -fvi ./configure --enable-debug=full --prefix=/ihome/db/redis/twemproxy make -j8 make install 安装完毕的结构： ╭─sky@sky-linux /ihome/db/redis/twemproxy ╰─➤ tree . . ├── sbin │ └── nutcracker └── share └── man └── man8 └──

item.title: RabbitMQ 3.6 集群使用
item.description: 创建集群 先把所有的插件都禁用先，避免因插件的端口问题导致集群启动不了. 默认插件监听端口: rabbit_stomp_listenersup:::61613 rabbit_mqtt_listenersup:::1883 rabbitmq_management:::15672 rabbitmq-plugins -n node1@localhost list rabbitmq-plugins -n node1@localhost disable rabbitmq_management rabbitmq-plugins -n node1@localhost disable rabbitmq_mqtt rabbitmq-plugins -n node1@localhost disable rabbitmq_stomp 集群节点
